entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • XmlWriter should allow setting not to output space before closing slash for empty elements #109629
  • [9.0][wasm] Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref with version (= 8.0.11) or (= 6.0.36) #109627
  • [9.0][wasm] Wasm.Build.NativeRebuild.Tests.FlagsChangeRebuildTests.ExtraEmccFlagsSetButNoRealChange fails: xpected the multithreading runtime pack to be available when running on CI #109626
  • [9.0][wasm] Wasi.Build.Tests.HttpTests.HttpBuildThenRunThenPublish expects Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.wasi-wasm/9.0.1-ci but using 9.0.1 #109625
  • Utf8.TryWrite applies alignment by counting bytes instead of characters #109615
    10.0.0
  • Environment.GetFolderPath(SpecialFolder.LocalApplicationData) returns empty path on certain macOS #109614
  • Failed to locate managed application c3ab8ff13720e8ad9047dd39466b3c8974e592c2fa383d4a3960714caef0c4f2 #109611
  • Regressions from 3-opt #109613
  • Compiler bug in release mode #109606
  • Publish Failure in .NET 9 RC 2 for Blazor Web App (.NET 8, Auto Render Mode) and Blazor WASM (.NET 8) with Localization #109604
    8.0.x
  • Memory leak when polling ssl endpoint #109600

Closed

  • Consider publishing new version of System.Data.Common without transitive vulnerability #109551
  • EventPipe logging for self-describing events erroneously cache level/keyword #35393
  • Test failure: GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.cmd #107528
    10.0.0
  • Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimSession.Create Error #109368
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/TryCatchInFinally/TryCatchInFinally.cmd #109574
    10.0.0
  • Failing stepping when debugging managed code on Debug runtime #109589
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add System.Text.Json.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range) #107962
    10.0.0
  • [browser] tests and fixes for heap larger than 2GB #104618
    10.0.0
  • [wasi] `async`/`await` on WASIp2 #102894
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Cloned loop not fully strength reduced on arm64 #109412
    10.0.0
  • Problems when crosscompiling and statically linking openssl and icu #109175
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove and readd .deb, .rpm, and .pkg as FileExtensionSignInfos #109628
    needs-area-label
  • [EventTrace] AddEventPipe filter data parsing #109624
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Update Android image to one with a new NDK and command line tools #109622
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Reference net10.0 path for ILLink.Tasks assembly #109619
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Update IHttpClientLogger.cs and IHttpClientAsyncLogger.cs remarks #109618
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Change arm64 asm code to load function addresses via GOT #109617
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Respect `ClassInterfaceAttribute` during COM server activation #109616
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Check in offsets files used for AOT cross compilers #109612
    area-Build-mono
  • [HTTP] WinHttpHandler - Increase the default drain size #109610
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Mark some intrinsics as must-expand for NAOT due to ILScanner dependencies #109609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `DAMT.*WithInherited` #109608
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add left handed spherical and cyclindrical billboards #109605
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Apply OverloadResolutionPriority to Span-based delegating to ROS counterparts #109602
    area-System.Memory
  • Build the cdac as part of clr.tools instead of as a prereq to the runtime native build #109598
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Merged

  • Clarifying instructions for GenerateReferenceAssemblySource target #109468
    area-Meta
  • Change iOS PEM searcher to use PemEncoding.TryFindUtf8 #109564
    area-System.Security
  • Update branding to 9.0.1 #109563
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Unify corerun's implementation of the native debugger check with the minipal for all platforms #109599
    area-Host
  • Fix servicing version of Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #109238
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #109620
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Don't split up partially-hot call-finally pairs during 3-opt layout #109592
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix debug-only assert in IsInPlaceSingleStep #109603
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Clean up code with `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` #109507
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Don't drop the warning/error code and type when overriding by binlog #109607
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add `STJ.Nodes.JsonArray.Remove(All|Range)` #109472
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILASM] Add wrappers for platform-specific SHA-256 implementations #109559
    area-ILTools-coreclr

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2577548 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add draft of runtime async ECMA-335 changes #104063
    area-Meta
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #109580
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Span<byte> overloads for ProtectedData #109529
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Exclude shared libs from ilcframework in nupkg #109253
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify temporary keychain password-gen #109422
    area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add VPCLMULQDQ intrinsics #109137
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Gc poll without HELPER_METHOD_FRAME #109378
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Block exporting DllMain #109545
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109596
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix erroneous success in AsnDecoder.ReadSequence #109595
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Formats.Asn1
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Release/8.0] Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109579
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.12
  • [cdac] Handle non-default active version and explicit IL code version cases for `CodeVersions.GetActiveNativeCodeVersion` #109560
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [WASIp2] soft debugger via sockets #109584
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • Move GenTreeVecCon and GenTreeMskCon under the respective FEATURE_* defines #104932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Add AOT annotations to System.Private.Xml and System.Data.Common #109528
    area-System.Xml
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [DRAFT] Allow using H/3 with WinHttpHandler #109508
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/8.0] Disable user mapper for SslStream on Windows (TLS 1.3) (#100833) #109116
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [WIP][mono] Try enable fullAOT-llvm arm64 CI jobs #106615
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Re-enable skiasharp WBT tests #109232
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Moved inlinearray_value to infrequent_data structure in MonoClass #109363
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Swift Bindings] Hiking app requirements #2749

Updated

  • [Swift bindings] Design of Swift runtime features #2705
  • Green Thread Experiment Results #2398

PullRequests

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Better demangle errors #2757
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Runtime Async] Add support for shared generics #2755

Merged

  • [Swift-bindings] Remove HikingApp from the main project solution #2754
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Disable `--compress-relocations` #2753

Updated

  • [SwiftBindings] Nominal type descriptor #2748
  • [SwiftBindings] docs for existential containers #2751
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge oct 01 #2750

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update SDK Containerization base image telemetry to account for Azure Functions base image usage #44732
  • Microsoft.Windows.SDK.NET.Ref package not referenced when targeting .NET 5.0 in .NET 9.0 RC.2 SDK #44705
  • The error "Unable to find package Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset with version (= 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.12)" appeared when creating the .NET project based on latest .NET SDK 10.0 with 17.12.0 Preview 5.0 #44703
  • rename `_SuppressWinFormsTrimError` to `_SuppressWinFormsTrimWarning` #44702

Closed

  • dotnet list package --vulnerable ignores auditSources in NuGet.Config #44722
  • CLI - dotnet workload restore fails on solution if there is a .esproj project #44587

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable test timeout dump collection #44730
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44729
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44728
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] improve SDK incremental builds by not running crossgen on inner loop builds #44726
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Separate build #44699
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24556.1 #44685
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44658
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #44665
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.2xx] Allow ProjectReferences to not have the _GetRequiredWorkloads Target #44701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • improve SDK incremental builds by not running redist-installer layout generation on inner loop builds #44687
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update vmr-build.yml #44711
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use STJToolsetVersion property and use SkipUnchangedFiles metadata #44709
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dotnet-watch argument parsing to use forward options from child commands #44631
    untriaged

Updated

  • Clean up namespaces #44691
    untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • sln-add: Support for slnx #44570
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Multi arch containers #43085
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Simplify file watching #44603
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Clean up polling file watcher #35712
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Create project templates target to 10.0 #44349
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Run 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' on 'BeforeCompile' #44695
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Avoid warning about empty NuGetPackageRoot in wpftmp projects #44688
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix OCI image tarball #44693
    DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Area - Formatting - 3 #75811
  • Area - Misplaced Using Directives #75809
  • "Use Collection Expressions" suggestion still appears even with multiple target frameworks, including those that target C# versions without support for collection expressions #75807
  • Collection initializers can leak refs #75802
  • Find all references to `dynamic` does not work #75800
  • Incremental Generators documentation is missing information about project setup (and more) #75798

Closed

  • Bulk "Use auto property" skips things that it can refactor individually #75634
  • "Use auto property" across a document/project only fixes a few instances per class #26527
    Backlog
  • Remove dependency of Remote.Workspaces on Features, if possible. #43775
    Backlog
  • Upgrading Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers from 3.3.4 to 3.11.0 Breaks Code #75810
  • Renaming a C# Field Used in a Switch Expression Within a Method to the Name of a Property That Accesses It in a Class Causes Visual Studio 2019 Community 16.5.2+ to Crash #43259
    Backlog
  • UseExpressionBodyForLambdaCodeStyleProvider needs to be rewritten to decouple analyzer and code fix/refactoring pieces #43148
    Backlog
  • Possible NRE: EditorTextFactoryService.CreateText may return null #43040
    Backlog
  • Clean up TemporaryStreamStorage, ITemporaryStorageWithName #43037
    Backlog
  • Interface method Implementation is not placing in correct order #42993
    Backlog
  • More consistent naming of Roslyn related OOP services #42582
    Backlog
  • Should parameters use their method accessibility when applying naming styles? #42037
    Backlog
  • Renamer renames only extension method but not callers in other assembly #41859
    Backlog
  • VS 2019 suggests turning single-line method statements to expression body methods, even if the statement is wrapped in an #if directive. #41596
    Backlog
  • Extract members to partial #41588
    Backlog
  • Update Dialog for Pull Members Up, Extract Interface, and Extract SuperClass #41576
    Backlog
  • Make it possible to run code analysis on multiple files/projects #41545
    Backlog
  • Renaming Method Parameter is Not Applied to XML Comments #41320
    Backlog
  • Project.RemoveDocument() doesn't validate the DocumentId given belongs to the project instance #41211
    Backlog
  • In ASP.NET Razor, Visual Studio throws a NotReferencedException when renaming a class or dictionary referenced in CSHTML file #41020
    Backlog
  • Clean up GetConvertedTypeWithAnnotatedNullability and GetTypeWithAnnotatedNullability #40961
    Backlog
  • C# rename refactoring; bug with macro-conditional code sections #40942
    Backlog
  • Symbol recognition improvement #40796
    Backlog
  • IDE1006 Naming Violation -- need legacy rule #40409
    Backlog
  • SyntaxGenerator.LocalDeclaratoinStatement should be updated to add 'add using' attribute. #39968
    Backlog
  • C#, Not functional "Cancel" button for namespace rename operation #39616
    Backlog
  • Editor: syntax node is not within syntax tree #39296
    Backlog
  • Using the editor dropdown to navigate to Visual Basic event handler is painful #37854
    Backlog
  • locals declared with VarPatternSyntax have their type annotated as nullable, even when expression in IsExpressionSyntax is clearly not null #75804
  • The tuple encounters a nullable inference error when using the LINQ expression FirstOrDefault #75797
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35507.17 #75799
  • `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function seems incorrect #75543
    17.13
  • IntelliSense loses the type of Action<T> parameter only while typing #72571
    17.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Update release/vscode branch with changes in 2.55.21 tag #75814
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Telemetry to match VS #75813
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Merge pull request #75552 from dotnet/dev/jorobich/dont-retain-prval-… #75812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update entry point finder to support `async Main` #75808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix indentation of 'else' keyword after typing it #75806
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update expected test results after recent pattern match change #75805
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Ensure frozen snapshots don't return less data if solution already has compilation data (backport to 17.12) #75803
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Ensure frozen snapshots don't return less data if solution already has compilation data #75796
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make MaxSupportedLangVersion calculation dynamic #75795
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix: fix all for Use Auto Property #75788
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Adjust `ContainingSymbol` for substituted local function #75636
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Bind lambda in object initializer despite errors #75695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Enhance explicit interface implementation completion provider #75568
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Convert single-line raw strings into multi-line on pressing <enter> #75648
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Test some assumptions (2) in OverloadResolution.vb #75792
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • EE: Support compact name in `IDkmLanguageInstructionDecoder.GetMethodName()` implementation #75764
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Revert "Reduce File I/O under the AnalyzerAssemblyLoader folder (#724… #75761
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Recover better when a user uses commas in a for-statement instead of semicolons #75632
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve performance on `SymbolCompletionProviderTests` #75496
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Ref safety: replace uint scope with struct Lifetime #75647
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust semantic model for method group conversion #75719
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Modify segmented list to grow by growth rate. #75756
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update VSSDK and Gladstone versions #75594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add new line before 'where' constraints in Quick Info #60545
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Struct layout check – break an infinite generic expansion cycle that doesn’t include the target struct (a cycle at the end of the path) #75702
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Bump Razor to 9.0.0-preview.24555.12 #75794
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test some assumptions in OverloadResolution.vb #75790
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Wasm pre-rendering (without server interactivity) - MSAL Auth on client side only not working #58833
  • Type disciminator is missing with OkResult #58832
  • Embed a Blazor component inside an Angular App needs very long to be rendered #58831
  • Loading an mp4 video static asset in Blazor returns http 416 error #58829
    9.0.x
  • The SignalR server is suspended and can no longer send messages to the client. #58828
  • BlazorWebAppOidc AddOpenIdConnect with GetClaimsFromUserInfoEndpoint = true doesn't propogate role claims to client #58826
  • Unhandled error when using Blazor .NET 8 template in Global page mode with FireFox #58824

Closed

  • Pvvx existing to other #58825

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add examples to AddOpenApi extension method/overloads #58808
    feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1
  • Set up Windows installer build for the VMR #58820
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix local failure in GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #58747
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • don't throw a misleading exception upon a BadHttpRequestException #58688
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • use GeneratedRegex property #58710
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Publishing MAUI App to the Store - The newly created provisioning profile is not listed, but the old ones are, and the "Download manual profiles" process has been done from Xcode #25741
  • The RealParent on Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Button has been Garbage Collected. This should never happen #25739
  • No background color on Flyout navigation bar #25737
  • [NAA] Enable disable Exchange Legacy Tokens in your tenant #25733
  • [ci] Public CI stopped working with MAUI pool #25732
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Unable to debug MAUI Android app using `<AndroidDeviceUserId>10</AndroidDeviceUserId>` #25730
  • Picker Selected item gets cleared in bindable layout (Android, iOS) - Bug introduced in Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.60 #25729
  • App crashes when entry bound to float value with fractional format #25728
  • Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.NavigationRenderer.ParentingViewController: Object reference not set to an instance of an object #25726
  • "ObjectDisposedException" When Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically #25724
  • Crashing on iPad when backgrounded #25723

Closed

  • [Windows] The screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage. #25518
    .NET 8 SR10
  • MainDisplayInfo reports page size instead of screen size in .net 8 #20137
    Backlog
  • [MacCatalyst] When using TabbedPage TabBar is not visible #25679
    .NET 9 SR1

PullRequests

Created

  • [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #25740
  • [iOS] Revert CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items #25738
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 3 #25734
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 2 #25731
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Add snapshot TabbedPage test on macOS #25727
    platform/macOS 🍏, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing

Merged

  • Preview Branding for SR10 (#25267) #25736
    .NET 8 SR10
  • [ci] Fix provisioning with sudo #25722
  • Disable NSToolbar Tabs (#25137) #25700
    area-controls-tabbedpage

Updated

  • Setup lane to run CV2 and CV1 tests #25719
    area-testing
  • Fixed [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #25311
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Ensure that MeasureInvalidated properly propagates up #25715
    .NET 9 SR1.1
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Fix for Editor scaling creating new lines on older iOS versions #25691
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR2
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement ContextMenu UITest extension methods #25340
    area-testing
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR2
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for the screen does not display when changing the CurrentPage of a TabbedPage #25690
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25374
  • Add missing android font weight #25437
    platform/android 🤖, area-fonts, community ✨
  • Fix issue with FilePicker for iOS apps running on Mac #25668
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed [Android] Label's HorizontalTextAlignment property is not updated properly at runtime #25176
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Primary Contructor Causes analyzer misfire #35062
  • EntityFrameworkCore slow with Oracle NLS_COMP = LINGUISTIC NLS_SORT = BINARY_CI #35061
  • Expressions without explicit type causes filter to be eliminated/false #35059
    Backlog
  • Issue while performing null check in where clause in linq for a non-nullable string property #35058

Closed

  • Being able to guarantee certain entity types are readonly (not tracked) at the dbcontext level, during Model configuration. #35046
  • Configure backing field in child object #35060
